Description:
Home On The Range
This stunning 4-year young town residence epitomises the saying 'home on the range'. Tucked away towards the back of the renowned Range Estate, within a quiet court where neighbours are friends and community is valued, this reserve-adjoining home boasts a serene setting to enjoy low maintenance living at its most relaxed. Taking in lashings of natural sunlight and lush green scenery at every glance, it offers two levels of functional living. The ground floor comprising a spacious lounge, open family/dining area and a sleek modern kitchen with Technika stainless steel appliances, high gloss - soft close cabinetry, glass splashbacks and stone countertops that double as a breakfast bar. An ultra-private garden with covered alfresco and timber bench seats is a tranquil sanctuary to entertain or simply bask in the beauty of the neighbouring reserve. A laundry with separate toilet and large under-stair storage crevice complete the downstairs layout. Upstairs, three robed bedrooms are accompanied by a bight central bathroom. The master suite boasting a sitting area, big walk-in wardrobe and ensuite. Enriched with luxury inclusions, it features heating, air conditioning, a Rheem continuous flow hot water unit, stone-top vanities plus an internal-access oversized remote double garage. A terrific location tops it all off. Situated within walking distance to the estate's pond, playground and barbeque area. Only minutes from buses to Croydon Main Street, Train Station and Chirnside Park Shopping Centre, local shops, eateries and premium schools such as Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther and Oxley College.
